item.title: 极光公司与麦克劳德软件公司合作管理自主卡车运输
item.description: 极光创新公司（Aurora Innovation）与麦克劳德软件公司（McLeod Software）周四表示，将把其自动驾驶卡车平台整合到麦克劳德软件公司的运输管理系统中，以促进自动驾驶技术的应用。【原文：Aurora Innovation will integrate its self-driving trucking platform into McLeod Software's transportation management system in an effort to boost adoption, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 杰克丹尼尔制造商布朗-福尔曼（Brown-Forman）季度销售额增长
item.description: 杰克丹尼尔酒生产商布朗-福尔曼公司（Brown-Forman）周四公布的第一季度销售额超出华尔街预期，原因是市场对其即饮饮料和烈酒的需求稳定。【原文：Jack Daniel's maker Brown-Forman beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter sales on Thursday, on the back of steady demand for its ready-to-drink beverages and spirits.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，裁员人数减少
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所下降，但不温不火的招聘可能会使 8 月份的失业率升至 4.3%。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits fell last week, but tepid hiring could raise the unemployment rate to 4.3% in August.】

item.title: 英国阿斯达公司警告称，沃尔玛 IT 分离完成后销售额将受到冲击
item.description: 英国第三大超市集团阿斯达（Asda）周四表示，由于与前所有者沃尔玛（Walmart）系统分离的重大 IT 改造进入最后阶段，本季度的销售额将受到影响。【原文：Asda, Britain’s third-largest supermarket group, said on Thursday that sales in its current quarter would be dented by disruption linked to the final phase of a major IT overhaul separating its systems from former owner Walmart .】

item.title: 由于商品成本上升，荷美尔食品公司季度利润低于预期
item.description: Skippy 花生酱生产商荷美尔食品公司（Hormel Foods）周四预计本季度利润低于预期，此前该公司第三季度盈利因商品成本上升而不及预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌约 7%。【原文：Skippy peanut butter maker Hormel Foods forecast lower-than-expected profit for the ongoing quarter on Thursday, after missing third-quarter earnings estimates on higher commodity costs, sending its shares down about 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 供过于求，票价低迷，中国大型航空公司上半年持续亏损
item.description: 周四发布的财报显示，中国最大的两家航空公司上半年亏损收窄，但由于运力过剩导致票价持续走低，仍牢牢处于亏损状态，这凸显了该行业在大流行后复苏的脆弱性。【原文：China's two largest airlines narrowed their first-half losses but remained firmly in the red as a capacity surplus kept fares low, earnings reports released on Thursday showed, underscoring the fragility of the sector's post-pandemic recovery.】

item.title: 印度小企业争相缓冲特朗普征收 50%关税的打击
item.description: 数以万计的印度小企业正争先恐后地在欧洲、非洲和亚洲市场寻找新的买家，以减轻本周三生效的对美国出口征收 50%关税的影响。【原文：Tens of thousands of Indian small businesses are scrambling to find new buyers in markets across Europe, Africa and Asia to dull the impact of a 50% tariff on exports to the U.S. that took effect on Wednesday.】

item.title: 对英伟达喜忧参半的前景和中国不确定性的反应
item.description: 面对华盛顿和中国政府之间的贸易战，人工智能芯片巨头英伟达（Nvidia）将部分中国销售额排除在本季度业绩指引之外，这让习惯了大幅预测的投资者产生了分歧。【原文：Nvidia investors accustomed to blowout forecasts were left divided after the AI chip giant excluded some China sales from its current-quarter guidance in the face of a trade war between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 福特因制动液泄漏召回近 50 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，福特汽车公司因制动液泄漏问题在美国召回近50万辆汽车。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling nearly 500,000 vehicles in the U.S over a brake fluid leak issue, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 因成本压力而季度利润不佳
item.description: Bath & Body Works 周四公布的第二季度利润不及华尔街预期，原因是该零售商正努力应对不确定的可自由支配的消费支出，但却受到成本上升的影响。【原文：Bath & Body Works missed Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by higher costs at a time when the retailer grapples with uncertain discretionary consumer spending.】

item.title: 由于对廉价生活必需品的需求强劲，Dollar General 上调了年度目标
item.description: 美元通用公司（Dollar General）周四上调了年度销售额和利润预期，在关税和通胀忧虑的背景下，该公司寄希望于美国各收入阶层注重成本的消费者的稳定需求。【原文：Dollar General raised its annual sales and profit forecasts on Thursday, banking on steadfast demand from cost-conscious consumers across income brackets in the United States amid tariff and inflation concerns.】

item.title: 苹果称英国移动市场动荡可能损害用户和开发者利益
item.description: 苹果公司周四表示，英国加强移动操作系统市场竞争的计划可能会损害用户和开发者的利益，并有可能迫使该公司与外国竞争对手免费共享其技术。【原文：Apple said on Thursday Britain's plans to increase competition in the mobile operating system market could harm users and developers, and potentially force the company to share its technology with foreign competitors for free.】

item.title: 需求稳定，百思买季度销售额超出预期
item.description: 周四，百思买公布第二季度销售额意外增长，主要原因是在线销售强劲，以及对人工智能电脑、手机和其他设备的需求激增。【原文：Best Buy posted a surprise rise in second-quarter sales on Thursday, driven by strong online sales and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers, mobile phones and other devices.】

item.title: 大众汽车扩大与亚马逊云计算的合作，利用人工智能节约成本
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司周四表示，该公司已将与亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）的 "工厂云 "合作关系再延长五年，因为该公司正在推广使用人工智能来改进生产和降低成本。【原文：Volkswagen has extended its 'factory cloud' partnership with Amazon Web Services by another five years, the German carmaker said on Thursday, as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to improve production and reduce costs.】

item.title: 早间竞标中国销售疑云模糊了英伟达的业绩
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家：印度9月俄罗斯石油进口量将增加，与美国分庭抗礼
item.description: 交易商称，俄罗斯9月份对印度的石油出口量将增加，因为生产商降价出售更多原油，因为他们无法在因乌克兰无人机袭击能源基础设施而受损的炼油厂加工更多原油。【原文：Russian oil exports to India are set to rise in September, traders said, as producers cut prices to sell more crude because they cannot process as much in refineries that were damaged by Ukrainian drone attacks on energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 纳斯达克期货收平，英伟达因中国市场不确定性下滑
item.description: 由于中美贸易战的不确定性迫使这家人工智能芯片巨头在其季度预测中剔除了潜在的中国销售额，英伟达（Nvidia）股价下跌。【原文：Futures tracking the tech-heavy Nasdaq were flat on Thursday, constrained by a drop in Nvidia shares, as uncertainty around the Sino-U.S. trade war forced the AI chip giant to leave out potential China sales from its quarterly forecast.】

item.title: 技术故障影响预期，CrowdStrike 下跌
item.description: 周四收盘前，CrowdStrike 的股价下跌了约 3%，原因是这家网络安全公司的季度收入预期疲软，表明去年一次失败的更新导致全球网络中断的影响仍在持续。【原文：CrowdStrike shares fell about 3% before the bell on Thursday after the cybersecurity firm's weak quarterly revenue forecast signaled the lasting effects of a botched update last year that caused a global outage.】

item.title: 宝马首席执行官表示，在推出全电动汽车之前 "不能犯错"。
item.description: 宝马公司首席执行官奥利弗-齐普斯（Oliver Zipse）预计未来几年汽车行业将重新排序，并在周四接受采访时警告说，该行业经不起失误，因为该公司将重金押在其改良后的电动汽车产品上。【原文：BMW chief executive Oliver Zipse expects a reordering of the car industry in the coming years, warning in an interview on Thursday that the sector cannot afford mistakes, as the company bets heavily on its revamped electric vehicle offering.】

item.title: 中远称在美国贸易压力下面临国际投资 "挑战
item.description: 中远船务港口公司总经理周四在香港举行的财报会议上表示，在美国贸易战的压力下，该公司的国际投资正面临 "挑战"。【原文：Cosco Shipping Ports said it is facing "challenges" with its international investments amid pressures from the U.S. trade war, its managing director said in an earnings conference in Hong Kong on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉和 Waymo 截然不同的机器人出租车方法将如何影响行业发展
item.description: 特斯拉于今年 6 月在德克萨斯州奥斯汀为部分粉丝推出了机器人出租车试运行服务，一个月后，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）告诉投资者，该公司的无人驾驶出租车将有可能在今年年底前为 "美国一半人口 "提供服务。【原文：A month after Tesla launched a trial robotaxi service in Austin, Texas, in June for select fans, CEO Elon Musk told investors that the company’s driverless taxis would likely be available to “half the population of the U.S.” by the end of this year.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动数据平台需求增长，雪花公司股价大涨
item.description: 随着企业竞相对数据基础设施进行现代化改造并简化人工智能的采用，Snowflake 的股价周四大涨约 14%，这是对其人工智能数据库产品需求的推动。【原文：Snowflake shares jumped about 14% on Thursday riding a wave of demand for its artificial intelligence database products, as companies race to modernize their data infrastructure and simplify AI adoption.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行在过早发出裁员邮件后提供心理辅导
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）向员工道歉并提供心理咨询，因为一些被指定裁员的银行家被误发的自动邮件通知将被解雇。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group apologised to staff and offered psychological counselling after some bankers earmarked for job cuts were notified they would be fired in an automated email that was sent by mistake.】

item.title: 法国干邑销量下降 13%，原因是高端产品需求下滑
item.description: 根据路透社获得的行业数据，受法国白兰地高端系列需求下降和对华销售下滑的影响，干邑的年收入下降了 13%。【原文：Annual cognac revenues dropped 13%, hit by a drop in demand for premium ranges of the French brandy and a slump in sales to China, according to industry data shared with Reuters.】

item.title: 滴滴第二季度亏损 3.5 亿美元，原因是计提了诉讼准备金，尽管收入有所增长
item.description: 中国打车服务巨头滴滴出行周四公布，受一次性费用影响，第二季度净亏损25亿元人民币（约合3.5亿美元），尽管收入增长了10.9%，部分原因是海外业务的增长。【原文：Chinese ride-hailing giant Didi Global reported on Thursday a second-quarter net loss of 2.5 billion yuan ($350 million), driven by a one-off charge, even as revenue rose 10.9%, partly fuelled by growth in overseas business.】

item.title: 墨西哥官员表示，墨西哥将允许更多巴西肉类加工厂发货
item.description: 巴西农业部贸易秘书路易斯-鲁阿（Luis Rua）告诉路透社，墨西哥当局将在下个月启动对 14 家巴西肉类包装厂的审计，以批准它们向墨西哥出口。【原文：Mexican authorities will kick off audits of 14 Brazilian meatpacking plants next month to clear them to send exports to Mexico, Luis Rua, secretary of trade at Brazil's agriculture ministry, told Reuters.】

item.title: 波音寻求欧盟批准 Spirit 交易
item.description: 欧盟委员会网站上的文件显示，波音公司正在寻求欧盟批准回购全球最大的独立航空结构公司 Spirit AeroSystems。【原文：Boeing is seeking EU approval to buy back Spirit AeroSystems , the world's largest standalone aerostructures company, documents on the European Commission website show.】

item.title: 中国扩大对从美国、欧盟、韩国、日本和泰国进口苯酚的反倾销税征收范围
item.description: 中国商务部周四发表声明称，中国已将对从美国、欧盟、韩国、日本和泰国进口的苯酚征收反倾销税的期限延长五年，自8月29日起生效。【原文：China has extended anti-dumping duties on phenol imported from the United States, the European Union, South Korea, Japan, and Thailand for five years, effective August 29, China's commerce ministry said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩：特朗普对美联储独立性施压带来全球风险
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）在周四的一次演讲中表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国联邦储备局的攻击不断升级，可能会对金融市场和实体经济产生实质性的全球性连锁反应。【原文：President Donald Trump's escalating attacks on the U.S. Federal Reserve could have substantial and global knock-on effects on the financial markets and the real economy, ECB policymaker Olli Rehn said in a speech on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度首次面临针对网络货币游戏禁令的法律挑战
item.description: 一份法律文件显示，印度游戏公司 A23 已对政府禁止基于金钱的在线游戏的禁令提出质疑，这是该公司针对该法律提起的第一起诉讼。【原文：Indian gaming company A23 has challenged the government's ban on online money-based games, a legal filing shows, in the first case against a law that led to the sudden shutdown of popular contests and has thrown the industry's future into doubt.】
